message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this great product for $110. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle at $100?
I'm not sure I can go all the way to $100, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. How about $95?
